FuncDef: This command specifies the range of PPID values that are allowed by AA SCTP filter firewall.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the minimum SCTP Payload Protocol Identifier (PPID) to be permitted by the SCTP filter. The value must be less than or equal to the max max-ppid value. Values-0 to 4294967295.
Specifies the minimum SCTP Payload Protocol Identifier (PPID) to be permitted by the SCTP filter. The value must be greater or equal to the min min-ppid value. Values-0 to 4294967295.
